items.content_html: React Props App is a lightweight and modular counter application built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Vite. This project demonstrates React's props concept for parent-child communication, efficient state management, and dynamic UI updates. Tailwind CSS is used for responsive and visually appealing styling, ensuring a modern and clean design.
items.title: mdshamshadali/tailwindProps: React Props App is a lightweight and modular counter application built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Vite. This project demonstrates React's props concept for parent-child communication, efficient state management, and dynamic UI updates. Tailwind CSS is used for responsive and visually appealing styling, ensuring a modern and clean design.
